name: Giant Poetry heart - choose your own verse.
description:
This listing is for a customised heart with your choice of words or poem on the front. 

It measures 18cm x 14cm or 7" x 5" and is made from white earthenware clay - twice fired to a top temperature of 1100 degrees. 

You can choose any verse you like but if you look at the amount of words and the space on the display model, you should get a rough idea about how many words you can fit on. 

I have a variety of different colours for the background so if there is a specific colour you want just ask. 
I have red, dusky blue, turquoise, raspberry, green, deep orange, brown, yellow, black, 

The background is finished with a vintage style crackle glaze. 

This is a custom order and will take between 21-28 days to complete so please bear that in mind when ordering. 

When you have ordered your item please contact me here on
s243duke@btinternet.com or leave a  message with your paypal payment. to let me know what colour background and words you would like. 

Design copyright Dottery Pottery 2011
